headline: Trump Thinks Putin Is a ‘Genius’ for Invading Ukraine
author: Paul Blest
sentences:
Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy and other House GOP leaders said in a statement that Biden “chose appeasement” with Russia and that “the U.S. and our allies must now make the Putin regime pay for this aggression.”
